amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration Program by $10 million and to decrease funding for the Wildland Fire Management-Hazardous Fuel Account by $16.6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the National Forest System/Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration program by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 295 (Roll no. 667).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 130 - 295 (Roll no. 667).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Gosar.
